page.title: 08A Day At Beswick School
page.content: At 8.30am I set off to cycle to school with my friend, arriving around 8.40am. Before school starts, we play games in the yard. School starts at 9.00am with Assembly. Morning lessons usually consist of Mathematics, Spelling and Language work, with Music and P.E. on Wednesday. At 10.30am we have a 15 minute break and at 12 n00n we stop for lunch which is served in the main classroom. The meals are cooked at Leconfield School, about 3 miles away. Afternoon school starts at 1.15pm, and usually consists of Project work (i.e. integrated or environmental studies), Science and Art and Craft. We also have Games and Drama sessions. Afternoon break is at 2.30pm. School clubs, such as chess, stamps and craft, are held after lunch. Our micro-computer is used every day. School finishes at 3.45pm.
